definitions.definition: To incline the head up and down, as to indicate agreement.
To briefly incline the head downwards as a cursory greeting.
To sway, move up and down.
To make a mistake by being temporarily inattentive or tired
To head; to strike the ball with one's head.
definitions.example: Jones nods the ball back to his goalkeeper.

definitions.definition: To fall asleep while under the influence of opiates.
